comprehensive_overview: MethylDackel is a program for extracting methylation information from bisulfite sequencing data. It identifies methylated and unmethylated cytosines at single-base resolution.
core_features:
1. Extracts methylation information from bisulfite sequencing data.
2. Identifies methylated and unmethylated cytosines at single-base resolution.
3. Supports analysis of DNA methylation patterns.
